name: Turretz
description:
Fight the GALAXY WAR !
Collect over 26 BADASS turrets !

Unlock and upgrade unique turrets to plant on your planet !
The simple, addictive arcade / action / strategy game: Turretz !

◆ Super EPIC boss battle !
◆ Mix and match turrets to build your own DEATH PLANET !!!
◆ Upgrade your turrets to the MAX !!
◆ Challenge your friends with GameCenter support.
◆ Easy and simple controls

Simple, but Addictive
Turretz by 111%
